resources.string: Is it safe to ski tour in this area?
Have you observed any recent avalanches (within the last 24 hours)?
Have you observed any failures in the snow pack (cracking, whomping, blocking)?
Has there been significant snowfall in the last 24 hours?
Has there been a recent wind event (wind transported snow within the last 24 hours)?
Has there been a recent significant temperature fluctuation (temperatures rising above freezing)?
Are there any human factors at play?
